item.title: Azure NetApp Files: Revolutionizing silicon design for high-performance computing
item.description: Learn how the Azure Hardware Systems and Interconnect team leverages Azure NetApp Files for chip development. item.title: AI innovation starts here—join Microsoft at NVIDIA GTC
